annonstext:
Jurek Rekrytering & Bemanning erbjuder ett komplett utbud av bemannings- och rekryteringstjänster. Vi rekryterar och hyr ut alltifrån studenter till yrkesverksamma akademiker med mångårig erfarenhet och specialistkompetens. Våra uppdrag är främst inom juridik, ekonomi, HR, marknad och administration.			    

Camurus is a Swedish research-based pharmaceutical company committed to developing and commercializing innovative and long-acting medicines for the treatment of severe and chronic conditions, including opioid dependence, pain, cancer, and endocrine disorders. New drug products are based on our proprietary FluidCrystal® drug delivery technologies with the purpose to deliver improved quality of life, treatment outcomes and resource utilization. The company´s share is listed on Nasdaq Stockholm under the ticker "CAMX". For more information, visit camurus.com.Job Description summaryWe are strengthening our organization and recruiting a Paralegal / Legal Assistant.
In this role you will provide and perform a wide variety of administrative assistance and legal support to Camurus´ Legal team. You will be working closely with your legal colleagues as well as cross-functionally in an international environment.

Key responsibilities

• Review agreements and other legal documents
• Assist in drafting, maintaining and updating our internal guidelines, policies and procedures
• Assist the legal department with privacy matters and procedures related to the GDPR
• Project management
• Assist in day-to-day legal matters, including intellectual property matters
• Other administrative support

Qualifications

To be successful in this position you have either a paralegal education or equivalent together with at least 2 years of experience from a similar role. The right candidate must possess strong organizational and interpersonal skills. Additionally, the candidate should be a proficient writer, exhibit excellent attention to detail and demonstrate critical thinking. You are structured and organized in your way of working and can handle multiple tasks and tight deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

The opportunity for you

This is a great time to join a highly dynamic company during a very exciting phase of growth. The position offers a dynamic international work environment and a strong corporate culture, with the possibility for individual development and growth. Camurus has approximately 135 employees, with the head office located in Lund. The corporate culture is driven by innovation, strong collaboration internally and externally, ownership by everyone, quality, and passion for reaching our ideas and goals. This is a consultant assignment of minimum six months via Jurek Rekrytering & Bemanning, starting as soon as possible. After the assignment there is a possibility to be recruited by Camurus.

Application

Please submit your application with a resumé and cover letter in English to us as soon as possible. Since we are continuously reviewing the applications, position can be filled before last application date.
For this recruitment we are cooperating with Jurek Rekrytering & Bemanning. If you have any questions, you are welcome to reach out to the lead recruitment consultant, FIRSTNAME LASTNAME, on  TELEPHONENO , or email:  EMAIL . Please send your application via www.jurek.se today.
